title: The Morning Light - The Morning Light (2008)
description:
... since the only other torrent I can find of this album has no one seeding.  If you enjoy this album you might consider downloading their EP, Sounds of Love, which I have also uploaded.

The Morning Light, hailing from Pittsburgh, PA, make their debut, self-titled album a good one with this offering from September 2008 to follow up their EP, Sounds of Love.  Featuring upbeat melodies and a good amount of piano for the soul.  Hope you all can enjoy this album as I continue to do.

Track Listing:
1. Wake Up!
2. Done Writing Love Songs
3. Brand, New, Friends
4. Virginia
5. Clouds
6. Happy-Now
7. Follow Me Home
8. Honest (Apologies Endless)
9. Have You Tonight
10. This Way
11. Movin' Along
12. Heaven & Hell (Bonus Track)
